scene_end_anchor: Kaelen stood by the primary sky-glass anchor and observed the irreversible internal fractures spreading through the crystal. His attempt to stabilize the fading wards with his own vitality resulted in failure and physical exhaustion. He concluded that the High Spire's defenses would inevitably collapse before the coming sunrise.
constraints: Kaelen must exhibit physical signs of strain from his failed attempt to mend the sky-glass.
The violet light of the starfall must contrast with the existing void-silence of the valley.
The sky-glass anchor's fractures should react or resonate as the star approaches.
The impact shockwave must be the terminal event of the scene.
next_action: Kaelen watches the violet star descend toward the valley and prepares for the physical impact of the shockwave.
